title: TwistedWave 25.1 – Powerful audio editor
content: TwistedWave is a very easy to use and powerful audio editor. It supports Audio Unit plug-ins and many file formats, including wav, aiff, caf, mp3, mp4, FLAC, Ogg/Vorbis and ambisonic sound files. Good multichannel support. title: Bokeh 1.0 – Focus with Background Blur Photo Effects
content: Bokeh (background blur) is the visual quality of the out-of-focus areas of a photographic image, especially as rendered by a particular lens.
